content.raw:
‌

I could only test the non-nvidia version here at home.  I had issues with the DIST and GAZ variables in the Dockerfile.  I think [21633c7](#!/osrf/vrx/commits/21633c7522499e749ce86edf49eadb74ba987ac0) fixes the issue by setting as persistent ENV variables within the Dockerfile.

Please take a look at the [Docker build tutorial](#!/osrf/vrx/wiki/tutorials/buildRunLocalImage) to make sure I captured both the nvidia and non-nvidia options correctly.
content.html:
‌

I could only test the non-nvidia version here at home. I had issues with the DIST and GAZ variables in the Dockerfile. I think 21633c7 fixes the issue by setting as persistent ENV variables within the Dockerfile.

Please take a look at the Docker build tutorial to make sure I captured both the nvidia and non-nvidia options correctly.
